DataElement.preferredName: Grooved Pegboard Test Assessment Complete Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date of a completed assessment using the Grooved Pegboard test, a manipulative dexterity test using a pegboard device with five rows of five holes.  It features 25 key-style pegs with holes in various positions in space, and is especially good for testing lateralized brain damage.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A manipulative dexterity test using a pegboard device wiht five rows of five holes.  It features 25 key-style pegs with holes in various positions in space, and is especially good for testing lateralized brain damage._Having determined the value, significance, or extent of._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.__

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A manipulative dexterity test using a pegboard device wiht five rows of five holes.  It features 25 key-style pegs with holes in various positions in space, and is especially good for testing lateralized brain damage.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for NCI CCR Protocol in C3D.
